justification: “We found that our model managed to achieve the best score with ffPDC measurement … identifying MDD biomarkers.”
“When comparing PDC and DTF … PDC outperforms DTF within the context of this study,” indicating PDC was used to operationalize MDD status.

“DTF is derived from the transfer function of a multi-variate auto-regressive (MVAR) model, where DTF would estimate the connectivity … between two signals” and was one of the connectivity measures evaluated for classifying MDD.

measured_by: resting-state functional connectivity (rsFC) in the alpha frequency band
justification: “Fingelkurts et al. found that increased rsFC in the alpha frequency band is associated with depressive symptoms.”
